text: based on the positive reviews i read about this restaurant here i decided to go there for dinner however i was disappointed to find that the food was overrated and did not meet my expectations in terms of taste and flavor
i experienced food poisoning yesterday and it may have been caused by the lettuce or the shrimp dumplings
worst service ever

my purpose for visiting this location was to enjoy their red velvet waffle however i was displeased with the result the waffle lacked any coconut taste or resemblance to red velvet cake despite being wellprepared i wouldnt return to try other menu items
overprice and not very tasty  had a philly that was all grilled peppers with no meat wont be back
if youre looking for a tasty meal with a homemade taste this restaurant is definitely worth checking out the prices are so cheap that its hard to believe youre getting such great value
with its unassuming doorway its easy to miss this charming little spot if youre not paying attention

the food quality and service at this restaurant have noticeably declined they previously used cashews in their salads but now they have switched to peanuts furthermore their food orders are not wellorganized and their service is inefficient

as i strolled over i anticipated a negative encounter but everyone was courteous and congenial i did not enjoy the drinks but my time here was much more pleasant than i had anticipated the manager jerry is a very thoughtful person

this location has not provided any benefits to me the idea behind the building is lackluster and the architecture is antiquated the offerings are indistinguishable from other establishments and the ambiance is generic nevertheless the outdoor area on university avenue is the only noteworthy aspect of the place

as i sit here i am witnessing people caring for my kitten they have a fondness for cats and are thorough in their methods i plan to continue utilizing their services and find their disposition to be quite affable dr nancy moses was exceptional
i go here all the time about 4 times a month and i have never had a bad meal or bad service
although parking can be difficult to find and the portions may not always be great the food is always of high quality and the service is always consistent and reliable

i was a little apprehensive about this place because it was lunchtime on a saturday and we were the only customers what a surprise we both decided to go with the southern fried fish tacos and they were an absolute delight for our taste buds the mojitos were not too shabby either the decor was interesting and our waiter was outstanding
got food poisoning here yesterdayit was either from the lettuce or the shrimp dumpling

the chain provides a variety of barbecue options that are not bad although i prefer their texasstyle brisket and pulled pork the jalapeno beans are a good addition to the meal i havent tried them yet but the baby back ribs looked impressive furthermore their spicy bbq sauce is a musttry

this establishment is where i pay my rent and it offers a range of services including shipping printing money orders selling stamps and greeting cards the shop is managed by a lively couple who are incredibly kind although they can be a bit brief when responding to queries it appears that they also provide fax services but who still utilizes them nowadays

at this establishment the service can be erratic but the rice is always packed tightly you should expect at least 6 quirky incidents involving the service including the temporary theft of your credit card if youre running late from your reservation time its a good idea to call ahead to avoid any frustration the violin player adds to the charm of the place and creates a memorable dining experience for the customers
the imax offers easy parking and impressive exhibits making it an excellent destination however be aware of the abundance of children in the area
the behavior of the waiter at the restaurant was inappropriate and disrespectful which caused many people to opt for dining experiences at casinos ead of going to asian plazas

not that bad for a chain i prefer their texas style brisket and the pulled pork the jalapeno beans are pretty good too i havent had them yet but the baby back ribs looked amazing i also really like their spicy bbq sauce

the server was unusual disrespectful and unprofessional as a result many customers prefer to dine at asian restaurants within casinos rather than visiting asian plazas

no reservations on a football sunday and you are pretty much screwed waiting in line for an hour to get a table game and just to find out later that there are dozens of empty tables available presumably reserved but stayed empty food is decent service can be overwhelmed and slow
